message: Good Morning Deborah, Please excuse my tardiness in getting this to you. In addition to the fact that there written for the past two weeks -- it's made me unusually slow. I'm learning a new software program for the first time in about 5 years.) Welcome to Philip Morris! I look forward to meeting you next week when I'm in New York P.S. If this is not the information you need, please let me know. Thank you for your patience.
